bibl.title: Demotic for Papyrologists. A First Acquaintance.
bibl.note: The paper illustrates that a limited knowledge of demotic is necessary for papyrologists, and that this is not altogether impossible.

bibl.title: Atti del V Seminario internazionale di Papirologia. Lecce 27-29 giugno 1994

bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, Demotic for Papyrologists. A First Acquaintance.
Mario CAPASSO (a cura di), Atti del V Seminario internazionale di Papirologia. Lecce 27-29 giugno 1994 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 4 (Lecce, 1995) pp. 87-114, fac-sim.
The paper illustrates that a limited knowledge of demotic is necessary for papyrologists, and that this is not altogether impossible.
